attributes.action: Make it illegal for parents to withhold children from other parent
attributes.additional_details: To stop children being used as weapons. Stop them missing out on time with their other parent and family just because one parents says so. If there is no court order a child should be seeing both parents if they are at no harm from doing so, especially when the parent is so willing to have them
attributes.background: Make it illegal for parents to withhold children from other parent just because they dont like them, children are not weapons. They shouldn't have to suffer until the parent pays thousands in court to get an arrangement in place which often they cant afford to do so child has to just suffer
